nodes.text: Naga Sadow's insignia was a personal emblem used by Naga Sadow, a famous Sith Lord and dark side sorcerer who lived in the fifth millennium before the Galactic Civil War. It was notably featured on metallic brooches worn by Sadow's Massassi warriors. When Sadow became the Dark Lord of the Sith, he traded that emblem for the circular mark of the Dark Lords.
